Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 48th overall pick, by Chicago (A) in 1970...
Injured on 5/19/1970 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 7/28/1971 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for one week...
Earned first career win on 4/8/1975...
Traded from Los Angeles to Detroit on 1/31/1977 (Going to LA: CF K. Yamamoto, RF J. Clark. Going to DET: RF J. Burroughs, P D. Vossler, SS W. Randolph, C E. Rodriguez)...
Injured on 5/1/1979 with a Pulled Bicep Tendon, out for 3 weeks...
Injured on 6/13/1980 with a Pulled Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for 8 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Texas on 2/12/1982 to a 3-year deal worth $6,125,000 per year...
Traded from Texas to Cleveland on 7/31/1982 (Going to TEX: P K. Saucier. Going to CLE: P D. Vossler)...
Injured on 7/20/1983 with a Fractured Elbow, out for 7 weeks...
Injured on 8/16/1987 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Atlanta on 2/15/1989 to a 1-year deal worth $6,000,500 per year...
